Buena_Park.Walt Disney's Enchanted Tiki Room:
Walt Disney's Enchanted Tiki Room is an attraction located in Disneyland at the Disneyland Resort, in Magic Kingdom at Walt Disney World, and in Tokyo Disneyland at Tokyo Disney Resort. Opened in 1963, the attraction is a pseudo-Polynesian themed musical animatronic show drawing from American tiki culture.


== History ==
The attraction opened June 23, 1963, and was the first to feature Audio-Animatronics technology, a WED Enterprises patented invention.
